name: MIS Contingency_Prisoner_Balances_Report
description:
This is a contingency report that lists all balances for all current prisoners (including those out of prison) for today's date and Caseload Id. Below the current prisoners' balances is a summary of any balances held for any non-current prisoners. Totals of all prisoner monies held by the prison are provided, split by current and non-current.
CON0007 - v00.00.04

dataset.name: Current
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT * AS ACCOUNT_CASELOAD_ID FROM (SELECT AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2102' THEN (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CURRENT_BALANCE) ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2101' THEN (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CURRENT_BALANCE) ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2103' THEN (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CURRENT_BALANCE) ELSE 0 END) FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.CASELOADS AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS WHERE (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.BALANCE_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK (+)) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CASELOAD_ID = AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.TRUST_ACCOUNTS_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (((AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID) = SUBSTR((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */), 1, 3)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN (SELECT SAC.CASELOAD_ID FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC WHERE SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = SUBSTR((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */), 1, 3)))) GROUP BY AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE) _query0 FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE, SUM(COALESCE(AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.HOLD_BALANCE, 0)) FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.CASELOADS AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES WHERE (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.BALANCE_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CASELOAD_ID = AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.TRUST_ACCOUNTS_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (((AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID) = SUBSTR((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */), 1, 3)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN (SELECT SAC.CASELOAD_ID FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC WHERE SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = SUBSTR((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */), 1, 3)))) GROUP BY AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE) _query1 ON _query0.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = _query1.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY), dataset_ AS (SELECT ACCOUNT_CASELOAD_ID, SUM(CURRENT.SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_AVAILABLE_OPENING_BALANCE || CURRENT.SUM_OF_SPEND_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE || CURRENT.SUM_OF_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE || CURRENT.SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_HOLDING_OPENING_BALANCE) AS V_CURR_BALANCE_INC_UNAVAIL, SUM(CURRENT.SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_AVAILABLE_OPENING_BALANCE || CURRENT.SUM_OF_SPEND_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE || CURRENT.SUM_OF_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE) AS V_CURR_BALANCE_AVAIL, SUM(ALL_PRISONERS.SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_HOLDING_OPENING_BALANCE) || V_ALL_BALANCE_AVAIL AS V_ALL_BALANCE_INC_UNAVAIL, SUM(ALL_PRISONERS.SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_AVAILABLE_OPENING_BALANCE || ALL_PRISONERS.SUM_OF_SPEND_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE || ALL_PRISONERS.SUM_OF_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE) AS V_ALL_BALANCE_AVAIL FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: All Prisoners
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT * AS ACCOUNT_CASELOAD_ID FROM (SELECT AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID, AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2101' THEN (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CURRENT_BALANCE) ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2102' THEN (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CURRENT_BALANCE) ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2103' THEN (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CURRENT_BALANCE) ELSE 0 END) FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE, BODIMIS.CASELOADS AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS WHERE (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.BALANCE_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK (+)) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CASELOAD_ID = AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.TRUST_ACCOUNTS_FLAG = 'Y') AND (((AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID) = SUBSTR((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */), 1, 3)) AND AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'DD/MM/YYYY')) GROUP BY AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID, AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE) _query0 FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID, AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE, SUM(COALESCE(AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.HOLD_BALANCE, 0)) FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE, BODIMIS.CASELOADS AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES WHERE (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.BALANCE_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CASELOAD_ID = AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.TRUST_ACCOUNTS_FLAG = 'Y') AND (((AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID) = SUBSTR((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */), 1, 3)) AND AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'DD/MM/YYYY')) GROUP BY AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID, AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE) _query1 ON _query0.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = _query1.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY), dataset_ AS (SELECT ACCOUNT_CASELOAD_ID FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT TRUNC(BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_END_DATETIME) AS LOAD_END_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT LOAD_END_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_CURR_BALANCE_INC_UNAVAIL
field.legacySql: =Sum([Current].[Sum of Private Cash Account Available Opening-Balance]+[Current].[Sum of Spend Account Opening-Balance]+[Current].[Sum of Savings Account Opening-Balance]+[Current].[Sum of Private Cash Account Holding Opening-Balance])

field.name: $ref:V_CURR_BALANCE_AVAIL
field.legacySql: =Sum([Current].[Sum of Private Cash Account Available Opening-Balance]+[Current].[Sum of Spend Account Opening-Balance]+[Current].[Sum of Savings Account Opening-Balance])

field.name: $ref:V_ALL_BALANCE_INC_UNAVAIL
field.legacySql: =Sum([All Prisoners].[Sum of Private Cash Account Holding Opening-Balance])+[v_All_Balance_Avail]

field.name: $ref:V_ALL_BALANCE_AVAIL
field.legacySql: =Sum([All Prisoners].[Sum of Private Cash Account Available Opening-Balance]+[All Prisoners].[Sum of Spend Account Opening-Balance]+[All Prisoners].[Sum of Savings Account Opening-Balance])

field.name: $ref:V_CURR_BALANCE_INC_UNAVAIL
field.legacySql: =Sum([Current].[Sum of Private Cash Account Available Opening-Balance]+[Current].[Sum of Spend Account Opening-Balance]+[Current].[Sum of Savings Account Opening-Balance]+[Current].[Sum of Private Cash Account Holding Opening-Balance])

field.name: $ref:V_CURR_BALANCE_AVAIL
field.legacySql: =Sum([Current].[Sum of Private Cash Account Available Opening-Balance]+[Current].[Sum of Spend Account Opening-Balance]+[Current].[Sum of Savings Account Opening-Balance])

field.name: $ref:V_ALL_BALANCE_INC_UNAVAIL
field.legacySql: =Sum([All Prisoners].[Sum of Private Cash Account Holding Opening-Balance])+[v_All_Balance_Avail]

field.name: $ref:V_ALL_BALANCE_AVAIL
field.legacySql: =Sum([All Prisoners].[Sum of Private Cash Account Available Opening-Balance]+[All Prisoners].[Sum of Spend Account Opening-Balance]+[All Prisoners].[Sum of Savings Account Opening-Balance])
